EmailTemplate.description: [Subject Line Testing A] Read the blog: What are the benefits to ATM as a Service [Subject Line Testing B] How can ATM as a Service benefit you? https://www.ncr.com/blogs/banking/atm-as-a-service-impact
EmailTemplate.name: 05-25-22 BNK ATMaaS Email 2.Email 2 Blog
EmailTemplate.subject: How can ATM as a Service benefit you?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Effectively running your ATMs is essential to your success, but it’s not a straightforward process. ATM as a Service simplifies your operations and allows you to focus on what’s important—your customers. Read our latest blog to learn more about ATM as a Service and how it could benefit your financial institution. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
